level.text: This chapter shall apply to holders of and applicants for a license, certificate, or registration.
Other chapters of this subtitle pertaining to specific health occupations shall supplement this chapter.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is ยง302(14) of the District of Columbia Health Occupations Revision Act of 1985, D.C. Law 6.99, D.C. Code ยง2-3303.2(14) (1988 Repl. Vol.), 33 DCR 729, 732 (February 7, 1906), and Mayor’s Order 86.110, 33 DCR 5220 (August 22, 1986).
